A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
One of the most aggressively stupid movies I've seen I  a while. I made an account here just to review it- please save your money and watch this on Netflix.

Plot problems caused only by characters not acting reasonably. No twists you couldn't see from a mile off. Neither Rey nor Kylo did anything that we wouldn't expect. Endless quips spoiling otherwise meaningful moments.

The deus ex machina at the end turns most of Ep IV and VI into one big plot hole. Scale is equally disregarded: the galactic Resistance comprises 3 ships and 400 people\, who spend the entirety of the movie trapped in a low speed car chase.

Without exaggeration\, the worst movie I've seen all year.
